channel.title: [508]Z508 Major HELP needed[508]
channel.description:
[b][u]Help needed:[/u][/b][u]Adding ::starter, adding ::train, on roof, adding ranging targets etc, with money, click delays.[/u]
Well, I got Z508, and I need help adding a starter.. I just want it to be money for the starter of 10 Million coins.
And I need to add ::train to be on the roof of varrock palce, also adding range targets for range, dummies for attack, door to get up strength, magic tree for woodcutting, hay stack for defence, rocks for mining, spinning wheel for crafting and viewing orb for magic.
I want it to add 15k each time you click and expirence to be 30k per click on all of them, also click delay of 1 second, I want the rocks to add Rune ore (noted), Mage Tree mage logs (noted), and 15k, also the spinning wheel, black d'hide set (noted)
If you could just all help a little bit, it may come out to be great,
Thank-you! :):):):)
NEW: Need help making yew tree usable...

item.title: [508]Z508 Major HELP needed[508]
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

Okay, now I just need making the yew tree give 30k and get up 30k expirence in woodcutting also adding with the 30k a magic tree log (1 per click)…

And I just need a 1.5 if not 1 second delay, between each click.

Could any one help me with that?

Read full topic

} if (cmd[0].equals("starter") && p.starter == 0) { if (p.rights >= 0) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 20000000); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "Spend your starter wisely."); p.getActionSender().addSoundEffect(p, 4044, 1, 0, 0); p.starter += 1; return;

item.title: [508]Z508 Major HELP needed[508]
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

right now I have got:

if (cmd[0].equals("starter") && p.starter == 0) { if (p.starter == 1) (Engine.playerItems.addItem = null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You're not aloud another starter."); return; } Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 10000000); p.starter += 1; }

I don’t know if thats right…
but it comes up with 3 errors saying:

Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:205: not a statement (Engine.playerItems.addItem = null) { ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:205: ';' expected (Engine.playerItems.addItem = null) { ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:205: cannot find symbol symbol : variable addItem location: class net.com.codeusa.model.items.PlayerItems (Engine.playerItems.addItem = null) { ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Ohhhh I sireously need help with this…

Now all I need is some where to get money for them…

item.title: [508]Z508 Major HELP needed[508]
item.dc:creator: @Sizurp Sizurp
item.description:
@Sizurp wrote:

Go to player.java and add

[code]public int starter

AND NOW IN COMMANDS.JAVA

ADD THIS - - if (cmd[0].equals(“starter”) && p.starter == 0) {//Code By Sizurp
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 1000000);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You’ve been given a Starter Pack!”);
p.starter += 1;
}[/code]
